tips.title: Soil Testing
tips.description: Test your soil every 2-3 years to determine pH, nutrient levels, and organic matter content.
tips.detailed_info: Regular soil testing helps farmers make informed decisions about fertilizer application, lime requirements, and crop selection. Test for pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, and organic matter content. Ideal pH for most crops is 6.0-7.0.
implementation_steps: Collect soil samples from different areas

tips.title: Organic Matter Addition
tips.description: Add compost, farmyard manure, or green manure to improve soil structure and fertility.
tips.detailed_info: Organic matter improves soil structure, water retention, nutrient availability, and beneficial microbial activity. Apply 2-5 tons per acre annually depending on soil condition and crop requirements.

tips.title: Crop Rotation
tips.description: Rotate crops to maintain soil health and break pest cycles.
tips.detailed_info: Practice crop rotation with legumes, cereals, and cash crops to maintain soil fertility, reduce pest and disease pressure, and optimize land use. Include nitrogen-fixing crops in rotation.

tips.title: Drip Irrigation
tips.description: Install drip irrigation systems for efficient water use and better crop yields.
tips.detailed_info: Drip irrigation delivers water directly to plant roots, reducing water waste by 30-50% compared to flood irrigation. Suitable for row crops, orchards, and vegetables.
implementation_steps: Set up filtration and fertigation systems

tips.title: Rainwater Harvesting
tips.description: Construct farm ponds and check dams to harvest and store rainwater.
tips.detailed_info: Rainwater harvesting helps store monsoon water for use during dry periods. Farm ponds can store water for irrigation, livestock, and fish farming.

tips.title: Mulching
tips.description: Use organic mulch to conserve soil moisture and suppress weeds.
tips.detailed_info: Apply crop residues, straw, or other organic materials around plants to reduce evaporation, suppress weeds, and improve soil temperature regulation.
implementation_steps: Keep mulch away from plant stems

tips.title: Integrated Pest Management
tips.description: Use combination of biological, cultural, and chemical methods for pest control.
tips.detailed_info: IPM focuses on long-term prevention through biological control, habitat manipulation, and resistant varieties. Chemical control is used only when necessary and in targeted manner.

tips.title: Beneficial Insects
tips.description: Encourage beneficial insects like ladybugs, parasitic wasps, and predatory mites.
tips.detailed_info: Beneficial insects provide natural pest control by preying on harmful pests. Create habitat by planting diverse crops and maintaining field margins.

tips.title: Disease Prevention
tips.description: Prevent plant diseases through proper sanitation and cultural practices.
tips.detailed_info: Disease prevention through crop rotation, resistant varieties, proper spacing, and sanitation is more effective and economical than treatment.

tips.title: Balanced Fertilization
tips.description: Apply fertilizers based on soil test results and crop requirements.
tips.detailed_info: Balanced fertilization ensures optimal plant nutrition while avoiding over-application. Consider N-P-K ratios, secondary nutrients, and micronutrients based on crop needs.
implementation_steps: Apply at right time and method

tips.title: Foliar Feeding
tips.description: Apply liquid fertilizers through leaves for quick nutrient uptake.
tips.detailed_info: Foliar feeding provides rapid nutrient uptake, especially for micronutrients. Apply during early morning or evening to avoid leaf burn.

tips.title: Cover Cropping
tips.description: Plant cover crops during off-season to protect and improve soil.
tips.detailed_info: Cover crops prevent soil erosion, add organic matter, fix nitrogen (legumes), and suppress weeds. Choose species based on primary crop and local conditions.
implementation_steps: Incorporate into soil before next crop

tips.title: Agroforestry
tips.description: Integrate trees with crops for multiple benefits and income sources.
tips.detailed_info: Agroforestry combines trees with agricultural crops to provide multiple benefits including soil conservation, microclimate improvement, and additional income sources.

tips.title: Weather Monitoring
tips.description: Use weather apps and stations to plan farming activities.
tips.detailed_info: Weather monitoring helps in planning irrigation, fertilizer application, pest control, and harvesting. Use local weather stations and mobile apps for accurate forecasts.

tips.title: Precision Agriculture
tips.description: Use GPS and sensors for precise application of inputs.
tips.detailed_info: Precision agriculture uses technology to optimize field-level management regarding crop farming. GPS guidance, variable rate application, and yield mapping improve efficiency.
